com.wesleyware.daowiz
Class Field

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wesleyware.daowiz.Field
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigIntField, BooleanField, CharField, DateField, DecimalField, DoubleField, FloatField, IntField, NumericField, RealField, SmallIntField, TextField, TimeField, TimeStampField, VarCharField
public abstract class Field
extends java.lang.Object

This is an immutable object representaion of a DB field. It is used in the construction of a DB record object.

Author:
Wesley Williams
